DOC.brief_title: β-Glucans Metabolic Syndrome - Human Intervention Study Under BEST
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The primary aim examine whether consumption oat two different barley β-glucans exhibit hypocholesterolemic effect understand underlie mechanism . Secondary aim investigate whether also effect blood pressure , appetite regulation , insulin sensitivity , hemostasis , low-grade inflammation metabolic profile different biological material . Intervention : In 4 intervention period participant drink milk drink together three main meal 21 day . This way consume 5g β-glucan/d form either oat barley three treatment period , otherwise maintain habitual diet . They , however , allow eat oat- barley-containing product trial . At begin end intervention period participant ' blood pressure measure fast blood sample drawn . Further collect feces 72 hour urine 24 hour end intervention period . Before end intervention period 4-hour meal test undertaken measure subject appetite sensation . Here first fast blood sample draw thereafter milk drink serve . Appetite sensation assess every 30 min 4 hour . Also blood sample draw 2 hour 4 hour meal test take place intervention period . At subsequent `` ad libitum '' lunch meal food intake measure final appetite registration make . Furthermore participant make 4-d food record end intervention period .
DOC.criteria: normal weight moderately overweight ( BMI 18.530 kg/m² ) chronic disease ( e.g . diabetes , cardiovascular disease ) elevate blood pressure hyperlipidemia consumption dietary supplement 2 month prior start study ( include vitamin tablet ) consumption oat barley product January 1st end study smoke excess physical activity ( > 8h/week ) medicine use ( included contraceptive occasional pain killer consumption ) pregnancy breast feeding
